official.headline: Old Profiles Resurface
official.anchor_line: After the Mosaic Reversion, citizens notice previous BCI profiles appearing in their system interfaces.
official.contextual_reframing: The Behavioral Compliance Index, or BCI, helps ensure citywide fairness and efficiency. Technical teams are optimizing data flows to prevent confusion and restore seamless services.

official.headline: Citizens Respond Calmly
official.anchor_line: Community reactions to the profile echoes are measured and constructive across Stenograd.
official.contextual_reframing: Open dialogue supports resilience as residents demonstrate trust in the Council's data management and progressive governance.

official.headline: Council Assures Order
official.anchor_line: The Council reassures citizens that all BCI functions will return to optimal performance promptly.
official.contextual_reframing: Proactive Council action upholds system integrity, delivering stability in city operations and public services.

underground.headline: Your Past Haunts You
underground.anchor_line: BCI 'echoes' dig up buried secrets and old scores for everyone in Stenograd.
underground.contextual_reframing: The Behavioral Compliance Index, or BCI, tracks your every move—now it’s exposing forgotten penalties and private pain, proving nothing is ever really erased.

underground.headline: Trust Breaks Down Fast
underground.anchor_line: People's hidden profiles are broadcast on public screens while officials scramble for excuses.
underground.contextual_reframing: The Mosaic Reversion glitched the system, but the Council blames 'optimization'. If the system is so perfect, why are our worst memories going public?

underground.headline: Council on the Defensive
underground.anchor_line: Demands for full deletion of personal archives spark protests and panic in the city.
underground.contextual_reframing: Selective erasure favors Council insiders while ordinary citizens stay exposed. Data is power. Those collecting it can destroy you with a click.
